sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-menu
        :default-active="path"
        router
        :collapse="isCollapse"
        style="width: 150px;
        min-height: calc(100vh - 5px);
        background: ghostwhite">
      <el-sub-menu index="1" v-if="user.role == 1">
        <template #title >
          ‚öôÔ∏è Manage</template>
        <el-menu-item index="/user" >
          üß∏ User
        </el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/news">
          üì¨ News</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbsadmin">
          üìú BBS</el-menu-item>
      </el-sub-menu>
      <el-menu-item index="/bms" style="margin-top: 20px">
        üì∞ News
      </el-menu-item>
      <el-sub-menu style="margin-top: 20px">
        <template #title >
          üìö BBS</template>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbs" >
          üìñ Index
        </el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbsStudy" >
          üìï Study
        </el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbsFood">
          üçΩÔ∏è Food</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbsShop">
          üõí Shop</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/bbsTravel">
          üö¢ Travel</el-menu-item>
      </el-sub-menu>
    </el-menu>
</template>

<script>

import request from "@/utils/request";

export default {
  name: "Aside",
  data(){
    return{
      user:{},
      path:this.$route.path,//ËÆæÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§È´ò‰∫Æ
      isCollapse:true,
    }
  },
  created() {
    let userStr = sessionStorage.getItem("user") || "{}"
    this.user = JSON.parse(userStr)

    // // ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊúçÂä°Á´ØÔºåÁ°ÆËÆ§ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑ ÂêàÊ≥ï‰ø°ÊÅØ
    request.get("/api/user/" + this.user.id).then(res => {
      if (res.code === '0') {
        this.user = res.data
      }
    })
  },
}
</script>

<style>
.back{
  font-weight: bolder;
}

</style>
